title: Chosen by the Demon High Lord
description: Reader Note: This content contains hot romance with some scorching sex scenes. Only for the adult eyes!  I and another were dragged to them in chains. We were arranged before the five men facing them. Our captor scurried over to the table and bowed low before the men. "My Lords, I present to you my most recent offering and the likes of which have not been seen in a hundred years." "That's for us to decide," one man, a burly man with a brown beard, countered. Our captor smiled and nodded. "My Lords and decide you shall." He stepped to the side and swept his arm over our little group. "All of them are strong, healthy females willing and able to please you in all the ways of the world."
author: N.M. Whittaker
